projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of my notable work and achievements

collectiveHealth.title: Collective Health
collectiveHealth.description: Current project - Health benefits platform that simplifies healthcare experience with clear coverage explanations, provider finder, and cost estimation tools.
highlights: Leading development of health benefits platform with 50K+ downloads and 4.4★ rating
Implementing secure health data management and HIPAA compliance features for patient data protection
Contributing to provider finder functionality and cost estimation tools for better user experience
Developing cross-platform mobile solutions using React Native for healthcare providers and patients

goldClub.title: Gold Club
goldClub.description: Productivity app by NSL Group designed to support retailers and distributors with value-added services, latest updates, and seamless agricultural solutions experience.
highlights: Developed productivity app for NSL Group retailers and distributors with 50K+ downloads
Implemented value-added services and latest updates functionality for agricultural solutions
Created user-friendly interface with dedicated support features for community engagement
Built seamless experience for retailers and distributors in agricultural sector

nslSubeejKisan.title: NSL Subeej Kisan
nslSubeejKisan.description: Comprehensive agricultural app empowering Nuziveedu farmers with tools, insights, and advisory services to improve farming practices.
highlights: Led development team and architected the complete mobile application solution
Developed weather updates and market price tracking features for farmers
Implemented multi-language support for diverse farming communities
Created farming calculators and product scan functionality for agricultural guidance
Built knowledge centre and nearby retailers locator for comprehensive farmer support

nslVyaparaMitra.title: NSL VyaparaMitra
nslVyaparaMitra.description: Connect with retailers with the NSL's distribution system and implement NSL's sales excellence Programs.
highlights: Ensured seamless functionality and UI responsiveness across diverse mobile devices and tablets
Developed and integrated all app modules, including screens, logic, and backend connections
Conducted precise UI enhancements to optimize user experience
Implemented NSL's sales excellence programs and distribution system integration

mcrcApp.title: MCRC App
mcrcApp.description: Develop improved crop varieties, high-quality planting materials, and sustainable production practices for farmers.
highlights: Led development team and managed project delivery for agricultural solutions
Ensured seamless functionality and UI responsiveness across diverse mobile devices and tablets
Conducted precise UI enhancements to optimize user experience and ensure consistent usability
Developed farmer-friendly interface and mentored team members on best practices

cortevaDaksh.title: Corteva Daksh
cortevaDaksh.description: Drive Demand Generation of Corteva products through activities conducted by Corteva field staff with standardized reporting.
highlights: Designed and developed specific application modules using React Native
Implemented features facilitating standardization of activities for Corteva field staff
Created tools to manage activity reporting and enhance team productivity
Built demand generation features for Corteva products with standardized reporting

meetHourApp.title: MeetHour App
meetHourApp.description: Fully encrypted, 100% free video conferencing solution with scheduling, rescheduling, and whiteboard features.
highlights: Enhanced UI for version 2.0 of the MeetHour app with user-friendly interface
Integrated new features like whiteboard into the application
Worked on bridging native Java Modules to React-Native for improved functionality
Implemented scheduling and rescheduling features for video conferencing solution

testimonials.title: What Colleagues Say
testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials from team members and stakeholders

testimonial1.name: Project Manager
testimonial1.content: NagaSainath delivered exceptional mobile solutions for our agricultural platform. His technical expertise and leadership skills were instrumental in the success of our farmer-focused applications.

testimonial2.name: Team Lead
testimonial2.content: Working with NagaSainath was a great experience. His ability to lead teams and deliver complex mobile applications on time while maintaining high quality standards is remarkable.

testimonial3.name: CTO
testimonial3.content: NagaSainath consistently demonstrated strong technical leadership and mentoring capabilities. His contributions to our mobile development processes significantly improved team productivity.

cta.title: Ready to Work Together?
